.
<Block>
  # Test 1
  <markdown>

    # Markdown can be embedded within <markdown> tags

        Here is some code

  </markdown>
</Block>
.
createElement(
  Block,
  null,
  "# Test 1",
  wrapper({},
    h1({},
      "Markdown can be embedded within <markdown> tags",
    ),
    code({}, "Here is some code\n"),
  ),
)
.


.
<Block>
  <markdown>
    # Markdown block 1
  </markdown>
  <markdown>
    # Markdown block 2
  </markdown>
</Block>
.
createElement(
  Block,
  null,
  wrapper({},
    h1({},
      "Markdown block 1",
    ),
  ),
  wrapper({},
    h1({},
      "Markdown block 2",
    ),
  ),
)
.


.
<Block>
  <markdown>
    <Block>
      # JSX blocks can be embedded within embedded markdown
    </Block>
  </markdown>
</Block>
.
createElement(
  Block,
  null,
  wrapper({},
    createElement(
      Block,
      null,
      "# JSX blocks can be embedded within embedded markdown"
    ),
  ),
)
.



.
<Block>
  <markdown>
    # `<markdown>` tags must end at the same indentation level that they started at
    </markdown>
</Block>
.
p({},
  createElement(Block, null,
    createElement("markdown", null,
      "# ",
      code({}, "<markdown>"),
      " tags must end at the same indentation level that they started at",
    ),
  ),
)
.


.
<Block>
  <markdown>
    # `<markdown>` tag content must
  not reduce in indentation
  </markdown>
</Block>
.
p({},
  createElement(Block, null,
    createElement("markdown", null,
      "# ",
      code({}, "<markdown>"),
      " tag content must",
      "not reduce in indentation",
    ),
  ),
)
.
